name: The Lost Tomb
description:
Explore different locations, collect useful items and solve intriguing puzzles in this escape adventure.

Enjoy this classic point and click adventure as you journey through gorgeous scenes with Veronica Wright in this sequel of her adventure.

The time machine built by her great great grandfather has crash landed in an unknown mysterious land once ruled by the Emperor Markshnun.
Legends suggest that a secret tomb where the emperor finally rested exists somewhere in these mystical lands !
It is there that you have to reach !!
It is your only way back !!!

Embark on this challenging quest to find the Lost Tomb!

For all those who need more help - Check out our Facebook page for the full walk through
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PlaytinumGames

Features:
★Simple point and tap game play aimed especially for mobile devices
★Wide range of scenes to explore
★Numerous challenging puzzles to solve
★Various items to collect
★Charming graphics
★Non-linear game play
★Auto save game facility
★Universal game to be played on all iOS devices
